name: Crusader Kings II: Sword of Islam
name_original: Crusader Kings II: Sword of Islam
description:
Crusader Kings II: Sword of Islam is a strategy game developed by Paradox Development Studio. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Paradox Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Crusader Kings II: Sword of Islam on PC.
